dict.string:
Forces the CC volume slider to ALWAYS use/adjust to a specified volume by simply tapping the slider dot. By default, it's currently set to 50% but you can change it to whatever you'd like. Useful if you normally adjust your volume via the vol rockers and hate having to manually re-adjust/fine tune the CC slider back to your preferred default level. This can also be used to child proof/lock the system wide volume level by using it along with the SpringBoard patch titled "Disable Volume Rockers". Made as a request via r/jailbreak.
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 8.4 (9-22-15)
